name: Bullfighting Hero
description:
**** FREE For Limited Time ****

Bullfighting Hero is action bullfighting game that has unique gameplay with easy control.
Try to beat bull at risky timing to earn more score!
Enjoy unique thrilling exprience with Bullfighting Hero.

FEATURES
- Support two ways of control: Tilt and D-Pad
- Various types of bulls, over 20 types of bodies and 10 types of horns.
- 4 types of Character
- Endless campaign modes
- Survival mode aims fore how long you can survive.
- Career mode
- 7 types of skills that can be upgraded
- Various play bonus for reward your evading and attack skill.
- GameCenter and OpenFeint support
- 10 Acheivements
- Original sound and voice
- Outstanding Artwork and Addictive play
